scenario: Agent A, a competitive distance runner, is stepping through the front door of his apartment where Agent B, his partner, and Agent C, his high school old buddy, are waiting to surprise him for his birthday. Agent B has spent the entire day cooking for him, knowing he's been craving home-cooked meals lately after the exhaustingly strenuous race schedule he's had. Agent C has never cooked in his life, but today he is here to support Agent B and to express his care for Agent A.
